attributes.action: Stop benefits to those who have never paid National Insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those who have never paid National Insurance should not be reciving benefits, with the exeception of the disabled (who qualify for the highest disability rate) and their carers.  Why should we work for others to sponge off the state?  Why should we pay for school leavers to sit on the dole and not attempt to find work? Why should they drain our pensions and NHS?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop benefits to those who have never paid National Insurance."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
